name: Quadromino - no rush puzzle
description:
Amazing, highly addictive, hardest block puzzle.

Game features and rules:
- No rush. Plenty of time. You can think as long as you wish.
- Bricks are not rotating or mirroring. So think twice about next move. Remove rows or columns.
- You can use hold zone for keeping figure. Use carefully.

Block puzzles are the best trainer for your brain & strategy skills. Play with your friends, play with your family. Check global highscores.
